ygData.msgSnippet: my mistake, I thought between the bleak Fletcher, the ogres on the bank and the ogre inside the first fortress you see that would be all the components? My

the ogre inside the first fortress you see that would be all the components?

> Salr you can buy ALL fletching equipment in Ferrot, not far from the ogre
> city. On the banks of the river is a small trading outpost of ogres.
> What

> Jaade,
